articles.title: Birthday Spread Sent to Pro-reunification Patriot
articles.content:
Birthday Spread Sent to Pro-reunification Patriot
Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un Monday sent a birthday spread to pro-reunification patriot Ko Kwang In, former unconverted long-term prisoner, congratulating his 80th birthday. 
					 The birthday spread is associated with the deep trust in Ko Kwang In who came to the DPRK after serving decades of prison life with firm belief in President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il as his mental mainstay.
					
					 During the Fatherland Liberation War Ko Kwang In joined the people's guerrilla army and waged the sacred struggle to drive out the U.S. imperialists and reunify the country in the middle of which he was arrested by the enemies. But he kept his revolutionary faith and sense of obligation for more than three decades behind bars. 
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il saw to it that he was brought to the fold of the DPRK and that a watch bearing the august name of Kim Il Sung, the title of DPRK Hero, the National Reunification Prize and other high state citations were conferred on him. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un made sure that Ko Kwang In took part as a representative in the celebrations of the centenary of birth of the President and celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War, and is taking warm care of his life.

articles.title: Cuban Embassy Officials Visit Pyongyang Maternity Hospital
articles.content:
Cuban Embassy Officials Visit Pyongyang Maternity Hospital
Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- Cuban Ambassador German Hermin Ferras Alvarez and a staff member of his embassy Monday visited the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital on the occasion of the 56th anniversary of the victory of the Cuban revolution.
					 The guests looked round different places of the hospital.
					
					 At the end of the visit the ambassador said:
					
					 The Pyongyang Maternity Hospital is associated with warm loving care of the great leaders of the DPRK.
					
					 Childbirth and treatment free of charge shows the true picture of the advantageous socialist system.
					
					 Seeing the babies born at this hospital, I am convinced of the rosy future of the DPRK.
					
					 I hope the Korean people would make greater success this year in hearty response to the New Year address made by the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The guests handed a souvenir to the hospital.

articles.title: South Hamgyong Provincial People's Hospital
articles.content:
South Hamgyong Provincial People's Hospital
Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- The South Hamgyong Provincial People's Hospital in the DPRK is well-known across the country for curing vaso-occlusive diseases.
					 In this regard, Ri Song Il, a vice-director of the hospital, told KCNA that last year the hospital had applied new surgical methods to successfully recover scores of patients from vaso-occlusive diseases.
					
					 Ri Song Guk, head of cardiovascular surgery of the hospital, said his department would go ahead with the research into new surgical methods more efficacious against vaso-occlusive diseases.

articles.title: New Trees Bearing Revolutionary Slogans and Historic Relics Exhibited
articles.content:
New Trees Bearing Revolutionary Slogans and Historic Relics Exhibited
Rangnim, January 5 (KCNA) -- Trees bearing revolutionary slogans and historic relics and materials dating back to the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle were newly discovered in the area of Rangnim to be supplemented and exhibited at the Rangnim Revolutionary Museum in Jagang Province.
					 The area is the place where President Kim Il Sung and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk energetically led the preparations for expanding the armed struggle to the homeland and actively greeting the great event of national liberation after marching into the homeland in the latter half of the 1930s.
					
					 The newly exhibited trees and historic relics and materials tell about the feats Kim Il Sung performed in the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and those Kim Jong Suk did by conducting energetic activities to carry out his plan.
					
					 Trees bearing slogans were discovered at Kajang Valley in Insan-ri, Toju Valley in Taehung-ri, and in Munak and Jangsong-ris of Rangnim County. They included "Illustrious commander Kim Il Sung beats back Japanese army here and there", "Anti-Japanese struggle" and "Long Live Independence."
					
					 There are also slogans representing the minds of fighters and people to hold Kim Il Sung who was leading the anti-Japanese war to victory in high esteem in the liberated country and glorify it, and their reverence for Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 Dozens of relics used by anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters were discovered at the secret camps on Wagal Peak and Mt. Sodong of the Secret Base on Mt. Rangnim and the site of the Temporary Secret Base on Mt. Ryonhwa, etc.

articles.title: KCNA Hails Bright Design for National Reunification
articles.content:
KCNA Hails Bright Design for National Reunification
Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- It is the steadfast will of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government to make national reunification come true in the new century of Kim Il Sung's nation. 
					 All Koreans are enthusiastic with ardent aspiration after national reunification, upon receiving the bright design for opening a wide avenue for independent reunification indicated by supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address. 
					
					 Owing to the outside forces' persistent ambition for aggression the Korean nation suffered a war disaster in the 1950s. Koreans have lived, exposed to the war danger in the biggest hotspot in the world, for seven decades due to the war moves of the warlike forces at home and abroad. 
					
					 The world has made a tremendous advance and the times have undergone dramatic changes, but our nation has not yet achieved reunification, suffering the pain of division. It is lamentable to everyone.
					
					 The large war exercises ceaselessly held in south Korea every year are the root cause of escalating tension on the Korean Peninsula and bringing the danger of a nuclear war to the Korean nation. 
					
					 It is needless to say that there can be neither trust-based dialogue nor improved inter-Korean relations in the tense mood in which war exercises against the dialogue partner are staged ceaselessly. 
					
					 If the south Korean authorities really hope for national reunification, they should discontinue all war moves including military exercises in collusion with outside forces against the fellow countrymen and make efforts to create peaceful environment favorable for national reunification. 
					
					 The national problem can never be solved by depending on outside forces and national reunification can be achieved by the strength of national independence only. 
					
					 As history shows, it is the shameless and traitorous act bereft of national self-respect to ask for "international cooperation" against the DPRK, peddling the national problem, the issues of north-south relations here and there, far from trying to solve them by the concerted efforts of the nation. This caused miserable consequences of blocking the improvement of the north-south relations and leaving the destiny of the nation as a plaything of outside forces. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should not seek "unification of social systems" that incites distrust and conflict between the north and the south. 
					
					 The north and the south should no longer waste time and energy over pointless arguments and trifling matters but write a new chapter in the history of inter-Korean relations. 
					
					 It is very important for the national reunification movement this year to activate dialogue, negotiations, exchange and contacts between the north and the south and mend the national bonds and bring about a great change in the north-south relations. 
					
					 Now every Korean should not remain an onlooker to the destiny of the nation in crisis. 
					
					 Responding to the patriotic call of Kim Jong Un all Koreans must turn out as one in the nationwide movement for national reunification and make this year a year of great change by opening a broad avenue for independent reunification.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Victoriously Greeting 70th Anniversary of WPK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Victoriously Greeting 70th Anniversary of WPK
Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- This year marks the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), which organizes and guides all victories of the Korean people. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday in an editorial says:
					
					 The 70th anniversary of the WPK marks a historic occasion to glorify the undying exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for all ages and show the world the true picture of the WPK which is holding Marshal Kim Jong Un as the center of unity and leadership and its militant might. 
					
					 Steadfast are the conviction and will of all the service personnel and people of the DPRK to make a present of the most valuable feats to the 70th anniversary of the WPK. 
					
					 When the WPK's 70th anniversary is glorified as a grand festival of victors by dynamically pushing ahead with the general advance this year, the dignity and authority of the WPK as the great party of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, powerful staff of the Songun revolution and genuine mother party will rise significantly. 
					
					 Now all the hostile forces that are displeased with the victorious advance in the building of a thriving nation are putting political and military pressure upon the DPRK and hell bent on the unprecedented moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK. 
					
					 The reality proves that the path of socialism chosen by the DPRK and its principled stand to counter imperialism to the last with the toughest counteraction are entirely just. 
					
					 All the party members, service personnel and people should dash ahead at the maximum speed of attack towards the grand festival of October with the unshakable revolutionary faith and the spirit of sure victory and thus register successes in the struggle to defend socialism and all fields for building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Achieving National Reunification by Concerted Efforts of Koreans
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Achieving National Reunification by Concerted Efforts of Koreans
Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year address put up the slogan "Let the whole nation join efforts to open up a broad avenue to independent reunification in this year of the 70th anniversary of national liberation!"
					 This slogan deals with the general orientation, goal and way of struggle in the movement for national reunification this year, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					
					 The national reunification, the cherished desire of Koreans, is the independent cause which should be achieved by the concerted efforts of all Koreans, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 To defuse the danger of war and ease the tension on the Korean peninsula and create peaceful environment are prerequisite to opening up a broad avenue to independent reunification.
					
					 The north and the south should refrain from seeking confrontation of systems while absolutizing their own ideologies and systems but achieve great national unity true to the principle of By Our Nation Itself to satisfactorily resolve the reunification issue in conformity with the common interests of the nation.
					
					 If they try to force their ideologies and systems upon each other, they will never settle the national reunification issue in a peaceful way, only bringing confrontation and war.
					
					 The DPRK remains unchanged in its stand to improve the inter-Korean relations through dialogue and negotiations and achieve independent reunification, peace and prosperity by the concerted efforts of the Koreans.
					
					 All Koreans in the north, south and abroad should turn out as one in the nationwide movement for national reunification in hearty response to the patriotic call of Kim Jong Un, true to the last instructions of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and thus bring about a great turn in opening a broad avenue for independent reunification without fail this year.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Invariably Following Songun Politics, Line of Developing Two Fronts
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Invariably Following Songun Politics, Line of Developing Two Fronts
Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- When the service personnel and people of the DPRK remain true to the Songun politics and the line of developing the two fronts, can they foil the hostile forces' moves to stifle the DPRK and certainly achieve the final victory, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) is the mode of revolutionary leadership and socialist political mode by which it steers the drive for defending the country, revolution and socialism and stepping up the overall socialist construction with the three revolutionary forces -- the Juche-based revolutionary party, invincible revolutionary armed forces and single-minded unity of the revolutionary ranks -- as a pillar and a mighty driving force for carrying out the revolutionary cause of Juche. 
					
					 The strategic line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the development of a nuclear force is the line for building a socialist thriving nation by bolstering up the nuclear force for self-defence to consolidate the defence capability of the country as firm as an iron wall while directing bigger efforts to economic construction.
					
					 The Songun politics and the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts are the creative independent politics and revolutionary line peculiar to the DPRK never to be found in other parts of the world and serve as an all-powerful treasured sword enabling its service personnel and people to win only victories in the showdown with the U.S.
					
					 The WPK's Songun politics and line of simultaneously developing the two fronts are not stop-gap ones to cope with the prevailing situation. They are just the strategic ones to be consistently held fast to for the supreme interests of the Korean revolution.
					
					 The validity of the WPK's Songun politics and the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts has been clearly proved in reality. 
					
					 The ruin of the U.S. is an inevitability of history. The U.S. is making last-ditch efforts to delay its ruin, thus making the international situation evermore complicated.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK will invariably adhere to the Songun politics and the above-said strategic line to firmly protect the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of the nation, concludes the article.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Denounced for Harsh Suppression of Media
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Denounced for Harsh Suppression of Media
Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Media Today on Dec. 29 last year conveyed a report by a Japanese major newspaper denouncing the south Korean authorities for their harsh suppression of media. 
					 It said that the Japanese newspaper on Dec. 22 said the south Korean regime's suppression of media was very harsh. 
					
					 It recalled that south Korean chief executive Park Geun Hye threatened media institutions criticizing the regime's policies and even revealed an attempt to close them. 
					
					 The paper said media organs and persons who reported about the case of Jong Yun Hoe's interference in state affairs, in particular, were accused or suppressed on charge of "libel" by the chief executive and her confidants.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Benin Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Benin Political Party Leader
Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, made public a statement on Jan. 1 in support of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's New Year address.
					 Ali Houdou stated:
					
					 Kim Jong Un in his address said that the entire Korean nation should turn out together in the nationwide movement for the country's reunification so as to glorify 2015 as a landmark in opening up a broad avenue to independent reunification.
					
					 HisThe New Year address for 2015 serves as the undying great programme clearly indicating the way of Korea's reunification as it calls upon the north and the south to resolve the national reunification issue in the common interests of the nation transcending the differences in ideology and system, briskly hold dialogue, negotiations and exchanges and make contact to relink the severed ties and blood vessels of the nation and bring about a great turn in inter-Korean relations.
					
					 On the basis of the revolutionary principles and independent stand, we will expand and develop foreign relations in a multilateral and positive way, giving top priority to the dignity and interests of the country, he said. This is very just.
					
					 The Socialist Party of Benin and I are convinced that the Workers' Party of Korea and Korean people will achieve brilliant success in the struggle for national reunification and global independence, fully supporting the parts of Korea's reunification and foreign relations in his New Year address.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Nigerian Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Nigerian Organizations
Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's New Year address for 2015 instills confidence and optimism into not only the Korean people but world progressive people.
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the Nigerian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy, the Group for the Study of the Songun Politics and the Group for Self-Reliance Studies said this in a joint statement on January 1.
					
					 The statement quoted Kim Jong Un as saying in his New Year address that however complicated the situation may be and whatever obstacles and difficulties may stand in our way, we should unfailingly achieve national reunification, a lifetime wish of President Kim Il Sung and General Kim Jong Il and the greatest desire of the nation, and build a dignified and prosperous reunified country on this land.
					
					 The north and the south should refrain from seeking confrontation of systems while absolutizing their own ideologies and systems but achieve great national unity on the principle of By Our Nation Itself to satisfactorily resolve the reunification issue in conformity with the common interests of the nation-this is his intention, it said, adding:
					
					 We fully supported his idea on national reunification.
					
					 Convinced that the Korean people will achieve significant success in their struggle to reunify the country, we extend invariable solidarity to them.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Praised by Ghanaian, Syrian Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Praised by Ghanaian, Syrian Personages
Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- Ghanaian and Syrian personages issued statements on Dec. 27 and 29 last year on the occasion of the third anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The deputy general secretary of the National Democratic Congress of Ghana said:
					
					 It is a great fortune not only for the Korean people but also for all other world progressive peoples looking up to the DPRK as a beacon of hope to hold the respected HE Kim Jong Un in high esteem as supreme commander of the KPA.
					
					 I am firmly convinced that the KPA under the leadership of First Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea Kim Jong Un will further demonstrate its might as an invincible army.
					
					 Saber Ballul, head of a department of the Political Faculty of the University of Damascus of Syria, said:
					
					 The international community is praising Kim Jong Un as the most outstanding supreme commander who provided a sure guarantee not only for security of the country and its people but for peace and security of the Korean Peninsula by bolstering up the country's military capability in every way.
					
					 He has wisely led the army and people of the DPRK to ensure that great successes are made in all sectors of socialist construction.
					
					 He is a brilliant genius of idea and theory who took over the great Juche idea, the Songun idea which President Kim Il Sung fathered and leader Kim Jong Il developed in depth as revolutionary legacies and who is faithfully carrying forward and developing them.
					
					 The Korean people under his wise leadership are vigorously advancing towards the final victory of their just cause, the socialist cause.
					
					 The DPRK will always shed its rays as a beacon of independence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Lauded by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Lauded by Foreign Media
Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- Nigerian and Bangladeshi media dedicated special write-ups to the third anniversary of Marshal  Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA) on Dec. 18 and 22 last year.
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its website an article titled "Characteristics of Kim Jong Un's politics".
					
					 The article said:
					
					 What is characteristic of the politics of Kim Jong Un who has led socialist Korea along the road of victory, remaining unfazed in face of the challenge of the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces and any storm and stress of history?
					
					 Firstly, his politics is the one purified by philosophical thinking.
					
					 Secondly, the politics is characterized by a firm resolution and steadfast faith.
					
					 Thirdly, it is an unpredictably mysterious one.
					
					 The Bangladeshi paper Blits carried an article titled "Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un seen by the world".
					
					 Three years have passed since his assumption of the supreme commandership of the KPA, the paper said, and continued:
					
					 Three years are by no means a long period but, in this period the world witnessed the outstanding supreme commander bolstering up the country's military muscle as firm as an iron wall and thereby protecting not only the security of the country and its people but also peace and stability of the region.
					
					 The world is also seeing the peerless supreme commander loving his soldiers so much and consolidating the whole army to be units of comrades-in-arms based on warm comradeship.
					
					 He will register greater victories in the struggle to defend socialism and in the cause of building a thriving nation by dint of the powerful military muscle.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Holidays Celebrated Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Holidays Celebrated Abroad
Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- There took place events in different countries on the occasions of the third anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the 97th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 A celebration meeting took place in Russia, a lecture was given in Guinea, and a book exhibition and a film show were held in Nigeria and Mongolia from Dec. 22 to 24 last year.
					
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos documenting Songun revolutionary feats of leader Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display were their works, and books introducing the true picture of Songun Korea.
					
					 Those events were attended by personages of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and Communist Parties-the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea, the Mongolian National University, and the Ministry of Labor and the Ministry of Agriculture of Yobe State, Nigeria and masses.
					
					 The secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party of the Russian Federation who doubles as first vice-chairman of the Central Council of the Communist Parties-the Communist Party of the Soviet Union said that Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the KPA was an expression of the boundless trust of the party, army and people of the DPRK in him.
					
					 The director general of the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea praised the revolutionary career and feats of Kim Jong Suk, adding that she is always remembered by the Korean people.
					
					 The minister of Labor and the permanent secretary of the Ministry of Agriculture of Yobe State, Nigeria said that thanks to Kim Jong Un with rare and distinguished leadership art the Korean people would surely build a thriving nation in the near future.

articles.title: Bangladeshi Political Parties Condemn S. Korean Authorities' Politically-motivated Terrorism
articles.content:
Bangladeshi Political Parties Condemn S. Korean Authorities' Politically-motivated Terrorism
Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- Progressive political parties in Bangladesh vehemently condemn in the name of world progressive people loving justice and truth the south Korean authorities for forcibly disbanding the Unified Progressive Party (UPP), regarding it as the hideous politically-motivated terrorist act of violating democracy and human rights.
					 The Bangladesh Communist Party, the Socialist Party of Bangladesh and the Bangladesh People's League said this in a joint statement on Dec. 27 last year.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 The south Korean authorities forcibly disbanded the UPP that was founded thanks to the will of the south Korean people aspiring after independence, democracy and national reunification and had conducted its activities as a legitimate political party.
					
					 UPP was a political party that had defended the interests of the south Korean popular masses including workers and peasants and enjoyed full support from them.
					
					 The program of UPP reflects the will and demands of the broad sections of people in south Korea.
					
					 Disbandment of the UPP is an act of denying justice and stamping out the interests and will of the popular masses.

articles.title: MINREX de RPDC condena la "sancion adicional" de EE.UU.
articles.content:
MINREX de RPDC condena la "sancion adicional" de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 5 de enero (ACNC) -- A la pregunta formulada por la ACNC en relacion con que Estados Unidos publico la "sancion adicional" contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea acusandola de hacking de la distribuidora norteamericana de fabricacion de pelicula SONY Pictures, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC respondio el dia 4 como sigue:
					El dia 2, EE.UU. publico una orden administrativa del presidente de imponer la "sancion adicional" contra la RPDC bajo el pretexto del ataque cibernetico a SONY Pictures.
					
					Tras ser rechazada y denunciada por el interior y exterior la divulgacion de una pelicula que agita de modo abierto el acto terrorista contra un estado soberano, EE.UU. diabolicamente arma alborotos contra la RPDC vinculandola con el llamado "terror cibernetico".
					
					Con respecto a la insistencia obstinada de EE.UU., muchos paises ya expresaron oficialmente sus posiciones negativas y los importantes medios de prensa estadounidenses y occidentales y los especialistas eminentes transmiten que el presente hacking no es "comportamiento del Norte de Corea".
					
					Muy perplejo por el incremento en escala internacional de la sospecha sobre los "resultados de investigacion" del presente caso, EE.UU. recurre desde los primeros dias del ano nuevo al acto hostil contra la RPDC para mantener a toda costa su honra y manchar la imagen internacional de la RPDC.
					
					EE.UU. expone al pie de la letra su verdadera intencion al negar obstinadamente la justa demanda de la RPDC de realizar la averiguacion comun sobre el ataque cibernetico.
					
					La "sancion" invariable y unilateral de la Casa Blanca demuestra claramente que EE.UU. todavia no esta libre de arraigado sentimiento  negativo y la hostilidad contra la RPDC.
					
					Ya llego el tiempo en que EE.UU. debe saber que sus "sanciones" contra la RPDC no le debilitaron sino centuplicaron el poderio del Songun.
					
					Cuanto mas imprudente y persistentemente recurre EE.UU. a la politica de aplastamiento anti-RPDC, tanto mas seran fuerte nuestra voluntad y decision de defender la soberania del pais y la dignidad de la nacion y el poder estatal apoyando en la politica de Songun.

articles.title: Premier coreano recorre Complejo Siderurgico de Hwanghae  y otras fabricas
articles.content:
Premier coreano recorre Complejo Siderurgico de Hwanghae  y otras fabricas
Pyongyang, 5 de enero (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, hizo conocimiento en el terreno de las labores del Complejo Siderurgico de Hwanghae.
					Recorriendo varios puntos del Complejo, el premier reconocio detalladamente el estado de produccion y de reconstruccion y estimulo a los obreros que entraron en primera jornada del ano nuevo.
					
					Tuvo lugar en el terreno la reunion consultiva de los funcionarios de ramas interesadas.
					
					En la ocasion, se dio enfasis a que es la linea vital de la propia industria del pais el rumbo del desarrollo de la industria metalurgica a base de las tecnologias y recursos domesticos.
					
					Se tomo las medidas para suministrar satisfactoriamente al Complejo los materiales, materias primas e instalaciones conforme a la importancia de su deber ocupado en la construccion de la potencia economica.
					
					Tambien, el premier recorrio la Fabrica Textil Kim Jong Suk de Pyongyang y la otra de Medias de Pyongyang.
					
					Pak subrayo la necesidad de establecer las correctas estrategias administrativas y empresariales, librar la energica campana para mejorar la calidad de los articulos y elevar sus competitividades y realizar la modernizacion apoyandose en las ciencias y tecnologias propias, a fin de glorificar mas las hazanas de  direccion del partido.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia alimentos de cumpleanos a Ko Kwang In
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia alimentos de cumpleanos a Ko Kwang In
Pyongyang, 5 de enero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio el dia 5 los alimentos de cumpleanos a Ko Kwang In, ex preso de largas condenas no abjurado conocido como combatiente patriotico por la reunificacion, quien cumple 80 anos.
					En el periodo de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria (1950-1953), Ko se alisto a la guerrilla popular y lucho por expulsar al imperialismo norteamericano y reunificar la patria. Fue arrestado por los enemigos y mantuvo su conviccion revolucionaria y obligacion moral durante mas de 30 anos en carcel. 
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il hizo traerlo a la patria y le otorgo el reloj con el nombre del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el titulo de Heroe de la Republica, el Premio Reunificacion de la Patria y otras condecoraciones estatales. 
					
					El Mariscal llamo a el como delegado a los festejos del centenario de nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung y del 60o aniversario de la victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria y siempre presta atencion en su vida.

articles.title: Reunificacion de Corea es causa independiente a ser cumplida con fuerzas unidas: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Reunificacion de Corea es causa independiente a ser cumplida con fuerzas unidas: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 5 de enero (ACNC) -- En su mensaje del Ano Nuevo, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un presento la consigna "!Abramos un ancho camino para la reunificacion independiente con las fuerzas unidas de toda la nacion en este ano del aniversario 70 de la liberacion de la patria!".
					En esta consigna estan sintetizados el rumbo general y la meta de la campana del presente ano por la reunificacion y el metodo para el fin.
					
					Asi comienza el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo divulgado el dia 5 y continua:
					
					La reunificacion de la patria, deseo de la nacion coreana, es la causa independiente a ser cumplida con las fuerzas unidas de toda la nacion coreana.
					
					Eliminar el peligro de la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana y lograr la distension y una atmosfera de paz es indispensable para abrir un ancho camino para la reunificacion independiente.
					
					Debe desistir de promover la confrontacion de sistema, absolutizando su ideologia y regimen y lograr la gran union, la gran unidad nacional segun el ideal de entre nosotros, los connacionales para resolver el problema de la reunificacion de la patria justamente a favor de los intereses comunes de la nacion.
					
					Si una parte trata de imponer su ideologia y regimen a la otra nunca se podra resolver por via pacifica el problema de la reunificacion sino se originaran solo el enfrentamiento y la guerra.
					
					Es invariable nuestra posicion de mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas mediante el dialogo y las negociaciones y lograr la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad con las fuerzas unidas de la nacion coreana.
					
					Al guardar en lo profundo de corazon el legado de los Generalisimos y el llamamiento patriotico del Mariscal, todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar deben levantarse como un solo hombre en el movimiento pannacional por la reunificacion de la patria y registrar sin falta en el presente ano el gran cambio en la reunificacion independiente.
